mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ctt_guestbook (user_id, x_coordinate, y_coordinate, z_coordinate, content, postItKind) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{x_coordinate}, #{y_coordinate}, #{z_coordinate}, #{content}, #{postItKind})
mapper.sql: SELECT u.id "u_id" , u.nickname "u_nickname" , b.id "b_id" , b.user_id "b_user_id" , b.x_coordinate "b_x_coordinate" , b.y_coordinate "b_y_coordinate" , b.z_coordinate "b_z_index" , b.content "b_content" , b.postItKind "b_postItKind" FROM ctt_guestbook b, ctt_user u WHERE 1 = 1 AND b.user_id = u.id
